text: Teraemi akasasamuha nirmana karaiche khutabihina, yito tomaloke dekhi acha, teraemi prthiraita sthapana karaiche sudrrha parbatamala yate prthiraiye tomalokaka lai dhali naparae lagate iyata sicaraita karai diche sakalo dharanara jira-jantu. Amiye'i akasara paraa pani barsana karao tara pichata iyata utpanna karao nana prakarara kalyanakara udbhida
